# defaultPixelFormat()

**Type Method**

Returns a default [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLPixelFormat] object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func defaultPixelFormat() -> NSOpenGLPixelFormat
```

## Return Value

A pixel format object with no attributes set.

## Discussion

Typically used with the initializer [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLView/init(frame:pixelFormat:)], this object has no attributes set.

## Managing the NSOpenGLPixelFormat

- **pixelFormat**: The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLPixelFormat] object associated with the receiver.
